components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:

    {{#each items}}

    • {{/each}}

{{ title }}

components/faceted-search/facets/rating:
{{#if items}}
{{ title }}
{{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{> components/products/ratings rating=title}} {{lang 'search.faceted.rating.and-up'}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} ({{ count }}) {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}

components/faceted-search/index:
{{> components/faceted-search/selected-facets this.selected}}
{{#if facets.length '>' 2}} {{lang 'search.faceted.browse-by'}} {{ join (pluck facets 'title') ', ' limit=2 }} & {{ toLowerCase (lang 'search.faceted.more') }} {{/if}} {{#if facets.length '<=' 2}} {{lang 'search.faceted.browse-by'}} {{ join (pluck facets 'title') ', ' lastSeparator=' & ' }} {{/if}} {{lang 'search.faceted.hide-filters'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.show-filters'}} {{#any facets visible=true}}
{{#each facets}} {{#if visible}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/faceted-search/facets'}}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{/any}}
components/faceted-search/selected-facet:
{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.title'}}
{{#if this.items}}
    {{#each this.items}}
  • {{#if facet '===' 'rating'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.rating-label' rating=title}} {{else}} {{ title }} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{else}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.no-filters'}} {{/if}} {{#if remove_all_url}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.clear-all'}} {{/if}}
components/products/price-range:
{{#and price_range.min.with_tax price_range.max.with_tax}}
{{price_range.min.with_tax.formatted}} - {{price_range.max.with_tax.formatted}} {{#and price_range.min.without_tax price_range.max.without_tax}} {{lang 'products.price_with_tax' tax_label=price_range.min.tax_label}} {{else if schema_org}}
{{/and}}
{{/and}} {{#and price_range.min.without_tax price_range.max.without_tax}}
{{price_range.min.without_tax.formatted}} - {{price_range.max.without_tax.formatted}} {{#and price_range.min.with_tax price_range.max.with_tax}} {{lang 'products.price_without_tax' tax_label=price_range.min.tax_label}} {{/and}} {{#if schema_org}}
{{/if}}
{{/and}}
components/sbthemes/category/sidebar:
<nav>
    {{#if categories}}
        {{> components/sbthemes/module/category }}
    {{/if}}
    
    {{#if category.faceted_search_enabled}}
        {{> components/faceted-search/index category}}
    {{else}}
        {{> components/sbthemes/category/shop-by-price shop_by_price=category.shop_by_price category_url=category.url}}
    {{/if}}

	{{> components/sbthemes/module/sb_extraslider/default status=true products=products.top_sellers moduleId=3 row=4 columns=1 banner="no" class_sfx="sidebar--bestsell" }}
	
	{{> components/sbthemes/module/sb_banner/banner status=true prefix="cmsblock" showContent=true limitation=1 display_mode="" class_sfx=""}}
</nav>
